page.title: 02LOCAL EMPLOYMENT IN BANKS
page.content:
EVERY DAY MY MOTHER GOES TO WORK AT SOME GREENHOUSES IN BANKS. THEY GROW LETTUCES,CUCUMBERS AND TOMATOES.MY MOTHER'S JOB IS PICKING TOMATOES AND PACKING LETTUCE.
MY DAD WORKS IN GREENHOUSES CUTTING LETTUCE. HE ALSO DOES GENERAL LABOUR ING JOBS LIKE BUILDING. MY BROTHER DOES SEASONAL WORK LIKE WORKING AT THE LOCAL FRUIT FARM AT MERE BROW.
PEOPLE WORK AT ST. STEPHEN'S INSTITUTE WHICH IS A SOCIAL CLUB WITH A BOWLING CLUB ADJOINING. THERE IS A PUBLIC HOUSE IN BANKS AND ANOTHER IN NEARBY MERE BROW.LOCAL PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED IN THESE PLACES. THERE ARE LOCAL BUILDING FIRMS AND ELECTRICAL CONTRACTORS IN THE VILLAGE. THERE ARE TWO GARAGES STAFFED BY LOCAL PEOPLE.
